root.name: EVA-Scanner
root.description: EVA-Scanner is a plugin use Micro-Manager to control arduino GRBL board and PicoScope to capture 3D image, originally used for Ultrasonic Imaging Platform of EVA project.
root.author: oeway - Wei Ouyang
